title: 菊花賞の後に・敗北を越え、次の憧れへ

text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser, who missed out on victory. Though her frustration shows, her positive attitude remains unchanged, saying, 'Next time!'
Meanwhile, in the underground passage, Mihono Bourbon and Rice Shower are seen. The two praise each other and promise to face off again in the senior class.
After returning home, at Matikanetannhauser's suggestion, they set 'The Tenno Sho (Spring)' as their next major goal while—
It was decided that they would include one long-distance race before spring, so their next target race is 'The Diamond Stakes'!
